name: iomeme
body:
## About
[iome.me](http://iome.me) is a web service used to quickly create the Internet's most popular memes


## Examples
* http://iome.me/ss
* http://iome.me/ss/hello
* http://iome.me/ss/hello/world


## Usage
Every [iome.me](http://iome.me) request takes three parameters:

> /type/top/bottom

Where:

* type (the type of meme) **required**
* top (top text) _optional_
* bottom (bottom text) _optional_

### Inserting spaces

You can use a "+" to insert a space into your text

* http://iome.me/ss/hello+world

Or you can use the url escaped value (%20)

* http://iome.me/ss/hello%20world

## Uploading to Imgur

When uploading images to [Imgur](http://imgur.com/), you can add "/.jpg" to the end of your iome.me url like so

* http://iome.me/sk/uploads+to+imgur/it+works/.jpg

We have to do this because Imgur expects the file extension to be at the end of the URL.

## Supported Types

* [Advice dog](http://iome.me/ad) ([About](http://knowyourmeme.com/memes/advice-dog))
* [Advice God](http://iome.me/ag) ([About](http://knowyourmeme.com/memes/advice-god))
